text: The Greek Civil War may refer to: ==List of conflicts== {|class="wikitable" |- !No: !Name !Result |- |1 |First Greek Civil War (1823–1824) |Agreement between the two factions, partial victory of the Government. |- |2 |Second Greek Civil War (1824–1825) |Victory of Roumeliotes and Islanders, imprisonment of Kolokotronis. |- |3 |Third Greek Civil War (1946–1949) |Lebanon Conference, Caserta Agreement (First Phase), Kingdom of Greece victory, Treaty of Varkiza (Second Phase), Kingdom of Greece victory (Third Phase) |}
title: Greek Civil War (disambiguation)
